name: LESIKAR, a.s.
goal: LESIKAR, a.s. designs and produces contactless sensors of position, speed, level etc. Applications mostly in automotive industry. R&D activities in the area of sensing and regulation. Type approved producer of motion sensor for digital tachographs.
interests: Business and Industry, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: Interest and activities related to requirements (technical, legislation, type approval etc.) on tachograph systems.
